org.redkale.net.http

类 DefaultRestServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.redkale.net.Servlet<HttpContext,HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
      • org.redkale.net.http.HttpServlet
        • org.redkale.net.http.HttpBaseServlet
          • org.redkale.net.http.RestHttpServlet<java.lang.Object>
            • org.redkale.net.http.DefaultRestServlet

  • public class DefaultRestServlet
extends RestHttpServlet<java.lang.Object>
    默认Servlet, 没有配置RestHttpServlet实现类则使用该默认类

    详情见: https://redkale.org
